content:
# World Engineering Day  for Sustainable Development 2025

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/world-engineering-day-for-sustainable-development-2025/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:49

World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development 2025, UNESCO AGH Chair Conference on  Engineering Solutions for a Sustainable World. 
UNESCO AGH Chair invite you to participate in the conference organized  to celebrate World Engineering Day for Sustainable Development 2025. The  event offers a unique opportunity to explore the role of engineering in  achieving the 17 United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. The  conference will address key challenges and innovative engineering  solutions. The event provides also a platform for inspiration and  knowledge exchange among experts, young engineers, and individuals  interested in shaping a more sustainable world. 

For more details see a dedicated event website: 
wed2025.uniune-events.agh.edu.pl
